entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
